ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND(RecordType.Name = $Setup.WAM_CustomSetting__c.Contact_Distributor_Record_Type_Label__c, !ISBLANK(Fax)), IF(OR(CONTAINS(Fax, "+"), CONTAINS(Fax, "("), CONTAINS(Fax, ")")), IF( LEFT(TRIM(Fax), 1) == "+", IF(!CONTAINS(Fax, "(") || !CONTAINS(Fax, ")"), TRUE, FALSE), IF(LEFT(TRIM(Fax), 1) <> "+", TRUE, FALSE) ), FALSE), FALSE)
